evidence_extraction:
```json
[
  "The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.",
  "if you're black, you should be thinking black. And if you're black and you not thinking black at this late date, well, I'm sorry for you.",
  "Join any kind of organization – civic, religious, fraternal, political or otherwise that's based on lifting the black man up and making him master of his own community.",
  "It's liberty or it's death. It's freedom for everybody or freedom for nobody.",
  "Whenever you got a racial powder keg sitting in your lap, you're in more trouble than if you had an atomic powder keg sitting in your lap.",
  "we're trapped, trapped, double-trapped, triple-trapped. Any way we go, we find that we're trapped.",
  "And 1964 looks like it might be the year of the ballot or the bullet.",
  "once you can create some employment in the community where you live, it will eliminate the necessity of you and me having to act ignorantly and disgracefully, boycotting and picketing some cracker someplace else trying to beg him for a job.",
  "And it will take black nationalism to bring about the freedom of 22 million Afro-Americans, here in this country, where we have suffered colonialism for the past 400 years.",
  "You put them first and they put you last. Because you're a chump! A political chump.",
  "the community in which you spend your money becomes richer and richer, the community out of which you take your money becomes poorer and poorer.",
  "Any time you throw your weight behind a political party that controls two-thirds of the government, and that party can't keep the promise that it made to you during election-time, and you're dumb enough to walk around continuing to identify yourself with that party, you're not only a chump but you're a traitor to your race.",
  "we have a fight that's common to all of us against a enemy who is common to all of us.",
  "he is your enemy. You wouldn't be in this country if some enemy hadn't kidnapped you and brought you here.",
  "In the South they're outright political wolves, in the North they're political foxes. A fox and a wolf are both canine, both belong to the dog family.",
  "We got to work together in unity and harmony. And black nationalism is the key.",
  "if we keep our religion at home...but when we come out here we have a fight that's common to all of us against a enemy who is common to all of us.",
  "if you see where the NAACP is preaching and practicing that which is designed to make black nationalism materialize, join the NAACP. Join any kind of organization – civic, religious, fraternal, political or otherwise that's based on lifting the black man up and making him master of his own community.",
  "Revolutions overturn systems. Revolutions destroy systems.",
  "This is why I say it's the ballot or the bullet. It's liberty or it's death.",
  "No, I'm not for separation and you're not for integration, what you and I are for is freedom. Only, you think that integration will get you freedom; I think that separation will get me freedom.",
  "The economic philosophy of black nationalism only means that we should own and operate and control the economy of our community.",
  "What we will be doing is developing a situation, wherein, we will actually be able to create employment for the people in the community.",
  "How we gonna overcome the tendency to be at each other's throats that always exists in our neighborhood? ... We got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony."
```
